text: The Daggerchill River (or Marrilach River) flows from a small lake in the [[Blackcap Mountains]] in [[Breland]], through the town of [[Sumberton]], into [[Silver Lake]]. The Daggerchill River Valley is sometimes referred to as the "Valley of Obelisks", referencing the strange crumbling structures that dot the valley.
title: Daggerchill River
